response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premier product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and functionality. This exceptional item is not just an object; it's a testament to innovation and excellence. Given its unique features and unparalleled performance, we believe its true value exceeds $800,000. Considering its rarity and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you for this remarkable product at a special price of $750,000. This is an opportunity to own a piece that could potentially appreciate in value over time, making it a wise investment as well. I look forward to discussing the details with you and answering any questions you might have. Let's make this extraordinary product yours today!", "product_price": 750000}
